name: FrameSearch
description:
FrameSearch is the perfect searching tool you've been missing from Figma.


Search for any Frames across all Pages of the document.


→ Launch the plugin and input the name of the Frame you are looking for.

→ Tap Enter to find any Frames across all Pages and jumps to the location by clicking the results.

→ Don't remember the exact name? No problem! Fuzzy match is supported.

→ Separate your keyword with empty space for more accurate results.



Binding keyboard shortcut: ⌘command + F


By binding the exact name FrameSearch with a keyboard shortcut, you can use Command + F to launch the plugin and start searching immediately.
